definition: Cangzhou prefecture-level city in Hebei
blue-green or azure (of water)/vast (of water)/cold
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
Cangzhou prefecture-level city in Hebei

sentences.english: Generally speaking, there are five major impressive advantages of Cangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 從總體上講，滄州有五大優勢令人矚目。

sentences.english: Wuqiao County, Cangzhou of the world famous acrobatic village.
sentences.chinese: 滄州的吳橋縣是世界著名的雜技之鄉。

sentences.english: The Cangzhou martial arts, always are called "open-type".
sentences.chinese: 滄州武術，一向被稱爲“開放型”。

sentences.english: Cangzhou's Wuqiao county is township of the world famous acrobatics.
sentences.chinese: 滄州的吳橋縣是世界著名的雜技之鄉。

sentences.english: Cangzhou is the famous "Pear Village" and "Watkins jujube" village.
sentences.chinese: 滄州是著名的“鴨梨之鄉”和“金絲小棗”之鄉。

sentences.english: It was the gathering Cangzhou bird fleas.
sentences.chinese: 那是滄州花鳥魚蟲的聚集地。

sentences.english: The Jinsi jujube is one of native product in the Cangzhou Area in Hebei Province.
sentences.chinese: 金絲小棗是滄州地區土特產品之一，馳名中外。

sentences.english: My hometown is beautiful Cangzhou. It teems of date and ya pear.
sentences.chinese: 我的家鄉是美麗的滄州，生產金絲小棗和泊頭大鴨梨。
